The transparent (and sensual) costume of daughter of AÃ­da Merlano; won halloween contest
AÃ­da Victoria Merlano Manzaneda, daughter of the ex-congresswoman fugitive convicted of buying votes, shared a recording in which she boasted her dress.

05 Nov 2019, 12:09

In the short, but suggestive video, you can see that AÃ­da Merlano's daughter is in a bar, which has Halloween scenery, and in the background she listens to electronic music.
The 20-year-old girl appears modeling the person who took the video, and comes out with a tight black transparent lingerie, wings of the same color and a long skirt with an opening, which reveals her toned legs.
â€œThe only thing I have and will always have in my hands, is my attitude towards adversity. ğŸ‘»ğŸƒ Happy Halloween! ğŸ¬ â€, was the message the young woman wrote on her Instagram account, which already has more than 60,000 followers.
According to what AÃ­da Victoria published in the stories of this social network, thanks to the transparent and sensual costume she was wearing, she won a Halloween contest.
